# Get input
N = int(input())
T = list(map(int, input().split()))
M = int(input())
P = [0] * M
X = [0] * M
for i in range(M):
    P[i], X[i] = map(int, input().split())

# Solve
for i in range(M):
    T[P[i]-1] = X[i]
    print(sum(T))
